thread.section_title: The Grosvenor Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location Can't Be Beat
thread.title_full: Location Can't Be Beat - Review of The Grosvenor Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Lisa S
title: Location Can't Be Beat
text: Beautiful hotel. Perfect for first time visitors to London. Tube and railway stations are connected to the hotel. Central location to get to all the tourist spots. Plenty of places in the train station to bring food back to the room after a long day. Executive King room gave us plenty of room and we enjoyed the breakfast and afternoon cocktails and snacks. Hotel staff was wonderful.
